channel.title: CVE Feed for templatemonster-2002 -- TM WooCommerce Compare & Wishlist
channel.description: The latest CVEs for templatemonster-2002 -- TM WooCommerce Compare & Wishlist

item.title: CVE-2023-5230|2024-08-02T07:52:08.450Z -- templatemonster-2002 -- tm%20woocommerce%20compare%20%26%20wishlist
item.description: The TM WooCommerce Compare & Wishlist plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via 'tm_woo_wishlist_table' shortcode in versions up to, and including, 1.1.7 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
